data.actual_result: Discord saves the setting and allows DMs from server members
data.expected_result: Discord doesn't save the setting and keeps DMs off
data.short_description: "Back" button acts as "Done" in server privacy settings
data.steps_to_repro: - Turn off Dams from server members from a server, and press done. - Go back, and recheck it, but hit Back instead of done.
